version_description: You can now download Prime movies and TV shows and watch them offline
Easily access your downloaded Prime Movies & TV Shows by tapping the new “Downloads” tab – you can sort by Movies or TV, and organise by download date or alphabetic order

version_name: 3.3.1-We've added a setting for Auto Play-Bug fixes and performance improvementsVersion 3.3-Prime members: now stream the subscriptions you signed up for on Amazon

version_description:
-Prime members: now stream the subscriptions you signed up for on Amazon, including SHOWTIME, STARZ, and more
 
-We’ve redesigned our app to make it easier for you to find what you’re looking for

-With X-Ray you’re one tap away from IMDB information on actors, songs, and trivia as you watch videos

-Can’t wait to watch the next episode of your favorite TV show? With Auto Play, when the current episode you’re watching ends, the next episode automatically plays

-3D touch quick actions let you access your favorite features faster and in fewer steps (only available on iPhone 6s and 6s Plus)

-Multitask while you watch videos with Picture in Picture and Slide Over (on supported devices)

-This version of the app adds support for iPad Pro

Version 3.3.1

-We've added a setting for Auto Play
-Bug fixes and performance improvements

Version 3.3

-Prime members: now stream the subscriptions you signed up for on Amazon, including SHOWTIME, STARZ, and more
 
-We’ve redesigned our app to make it easier for you to find what you’re looking for

-With X-Ray you’re one tap away from IMDB information on actors, songs, and trivia as you watch videos

-Can’t wait to watch the next episode of your favorite TV show? With Auto Play, when the current episode you’re watching ends, the next episode automatically plays

-3D touch quick actions let you access your favorite features faster and in fewer steps (only available on iPhone 6s and 6s Plus)

-Multitask while you watch videos with Picture in Picture and Slide Over (on supported devices)

-This version of the app adds support for iPad Pro

• Updates to our player user interface
• Bug fixes

- In-app Parental Controls: making it easier for parents to PIN protect mature content 
- New way to Contact Us: making it easier to reach Amazon customer service for immediate assistance
- Bug fixes

- In-app Parental Controls: making it easier for parents to PIN protect mature content 
- New way to Contact Us: making it easier to reach Amazon customer service for immediate assistance
- Bug fixes
Enjoy Amazon Prime Video in 200+ countries around the world
Enjoy Amazon Prime Video in 200+ countries around the world

- Parents can enjoy new and improved Parental Controls. Block mature-rated titles in Settings and unlock them before playback starts with Touch ID. Go to Settings > Parental Controls > Enable Touch ID
- Be the first to know about new content with improved push notifications. Enable push notifications now in Settings
- Thank you for all the feedback - please keep it coming, we read all of the great suggestions you send to keep improving our service!

This update includes bug fixes and performance improvements. In addition, this release contains enhancements to live streaming and a new X-Ray feature enabling you to add movies to Your Watchlist from within X-Ray.

This update includes bug fixes and performance improvements. In addition, this release contains enhancements to live streaming and a new X-Ray feature enabling you to add movies to Your Watchlist from within X-Ray.

This update includes bug fixes and performance improvements. In addition, this release contains enhancements to live streaming and a new X-Ray feature enabling you to add movies to Your Watchlist from within X-Ray.

• Watch on your Apple TV directly by downloading the separate tvOS app (requires Apple TV 3rd generation or later).
• Universal Search now supported – search for Prime videos using iOS search (US, CA, AU, NO, & SE only).
• iPhone X support.

New intelligent language selection will alert you when your preferred language becomes available in the app.

New X-Ray release. Starting today, you’ll have access to the Prime Video exclusive X-Ray feature for select live sports, including Thursday Night Football. This feature brings real-time stats, plays, and team/player information right to your fingertips while you watch. Click the X-Ray button or rotate your device to portrait mode to start enjoying X-Ray.

New X-Ray release. Starting today, you’ll have access to the Prime Video exclusive X-Ray feature for select live sports, including Thursday Night Football. This feature brings real-time stats, plays, and team/player information right to your fingertips while you watch. Click the X-Ray button or rotate your device to portrait mode to start enjoying X-Ray.
We’re excited to announce support for Chromecast. Cast to your big screen using your iPhone or iPad.

We hope you enjoy the redesigned video detail pages for iPad. If you have any feedback, let us know through Contact Us in Settings. We have also updated our Search and Watchlist pages. Some live streaming events now allow you to rewind (similar to a DVR).
In this release, we've made improvements to our live streaming experience. We've also fixed bugs and improved stability of our service.

In this release, we’ve made improvements and fixes to our accessibility/voice over functionality. We've also made other minor improvements to the app to improve the stability of our service.
Improvements to our accessibility screen reader and bug fixes.
In this release, we’ve made improvements and fixes to our accessibility/voice over functionality. We've also made other minor improvements to the app to improve the stability of our service.
We now support player controls from your keyboard when using an iPad Pro.
This release focuses on download improvements for iOS 12 devices and easier ways to find videos.

Our improved main page includes new imagery. We think it looks pretty fresh. We hope you do too.

You’ll now get notifications for expiring downloads. No more surprises the next time you board a flight.

No one likes bugs and we’ve squashed a pile of them. Enjoy!

Want audio only? Continue listening to the audio from your favorite movie or TV show when you lock your phone. In addition, we’ve made our app better for you by removing bugs and improving performance.

We now support larger and smaller font sizes based on your device’s settings. To change the text size within the app, go to Settings > Accessibility > Display & Text Size.
We now support larger and smaller font sizes based on your device’s settings. To change the text size within the app, go to Settings > Accessibility > Display & Text Size.
We now support larger and smaller font sizes based on your device’s settings. To change the text size within the app, go to Settings > Accessibility > Display & Text Size.

In this release, we added swipe-to-delete functionality on the Downloads page and included a few bug fixes and performance improvements. We’ve also consolidated your Watchlist, Purchases (in supported regions), and Settings under My Stuff. We hope this makes it easier to find your videos.
Browse, rent, or buy new release movies, popular TV shows, and more — now within the app (US, UK, Germany). In addition, now clear your search history in the Settings menu.
Press-and-hold (long-press) on videos to see the actions menu which includes play, add to Watchlist, download, share, and view details.
Use the Free to me toggle on the Home page to view only your Prime titles, channel subscriptions, and purchases.
Introducing Prime Video profiles. Profiles give each person on your account a personalized experience.
Change your Watchlist anytime, even if your device is offline. We’ll update your profile when the device connects to the Internet.
A new Find experience makes searching for videos, browsing top categories, and filtering by genres quick and easy.
A new Find experience makes searching for videos, browsing top categories, and filtering by genres quick and easy.
Now choose a profile image, ranging from animals to moods, when you edit or create a profile. Hope you enjoy.
